# sloth-input



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property               | Attribute        | Description                                                                                                                                                                   | Type                                                                                                                                                                                              | Default     |
| ---------------------- | ---------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `accept`               | `accept`         | Specifies a filter for what file types the user can pick from the file input dialog box (only for type="file")  Values: file_extension, audio/*, video/*, image/*, media_type | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                          | `undefined` |
| `alt`                  | `alt`            | Specifies an alternate text for images (only for type="image")                                                                                                                | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                          | `undefined` |
| `autocomplete`         | `autocomplete`   | Specifies whether an <input> element should have autocomplete enabled                                                                                                         | `"off" \| "on"`                                                                                                                                                                                   | `undefined` |
| `autofocus`            | `autofocus`      | Specifies that an <input> element should automatically get focus when the page loads                                                                                          | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                         | `undefined` |
| `checked`              | `checked`        | Specifies that an <input> element should be pre-selected when the page loads (for type="checkbox" or type="radio")                                                            | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                         | `undefined` |
| `disabled`             | `disabled`       | Specifies that an <input> element should be disabled                                                                                                                          | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                         | `undefined` |
| `form`                 | `form`           | Specifies the form the <input> element belongs to                                                                                                                             | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                          | `undefined` |
| `formnovalidate`       | `formnovalidate` | Defines that form elements should not be validated when submitted                                                                                                             | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                         | `undefined` |
| `list`                 | `list`           | Refers to a <datalist> element that contains pre-defined options for an <input> element                                                                                       | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                          | `undefined` |
| `max`                  | `max`            | Specifies the maximum value for an <input> element                                                                                                                            | `number \| string`                                                                                                                                                                                | `undefined` |
| `maxlength`            | `maxlength`      | Specifies the maximum number of characters allowed in an <input> element                                                                                                      | `number`                                                                                                                                                                                          | `undefined` |
| `min`                  | `min`            | Specifies a minimum value for an <input> element                                                                                                                              | `number \| string`                                                                                                                                                                                | `undefined` |
| `minlength`            | `minlength`      | Specifies the minimum number of characters required in an <input> element                                                                                                     | `number`                                                                                                                                                                                          | `undefined` |
| `multiple`             | `multiple`       | Specifies that a user can enter more than one value in an <input> element                                                                                                     | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                         | `undefined` |
| `name`                 | `name`           | Specifies the name of an <input> element                                                                                                                                      | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                          | `undefined` |
| `pattern`              | `pattern`        | Specifies a regular expression that an <input> element's value is checked against                                                                                             | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                          | `undefined` |
| `placeholder`          | `placeholder`    | Specifies a short hint that describes the expected value of an <input> element                                                                                                | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                          | `undefined` |
| `readonly`             | `readonly`       | Specifies that an input field is read-only                                                                                                                                    | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                         | `undefined` |
| `required`             | `required`       | Specifies that an input field must be filled out before submitting the form                                                                                                   | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                         | `undefined` |
| `size`                 | `size`           | Specifies the width, in characters, of an <input> element                                                                                                                     | `number`                                                                                                                                                                                          | `undefined` |
| `slothId` _(required)_ | `sloth-id`       |                                                                                                                                                                               | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                          | `undefined` |
| `step`                 | `step`           | Specifies the interval between legal numbers in an input field                                                                                                                | `any`                                                                                                                                                                                             | `undefined` |
| `type`                 | `type`           | Specifies the type <input> element to display                                                                                                                                 | `"checkbox" \| "color" \| "date" \| "datetime-local" \| "email" \| "file" \| "hidden" \| "month" \| "number" \| "password" \| "radio" \| "range" \| "tel" \| "text" \| "time" \| "url" \| "week"` | `"text"`    |
| `value`                | `value`          | Specifies the value of an <input> element                                                                                                                                     | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                          | `undefined` |
